description:
Sometimes bigger jobs call for bigger knives. From your pocket, to your pack, to your belt loop, the Reverb XL has plenty of carrying options, so it's never out of reach when it's time to get to work

  • 8Cr13MoV blade is easy to sharpen and holds an edge well
  • Stainless steel frame-lock design offers improved rigidity
  • Light and strong G10 and carbon fiber front handle scale
  • Machined fuller on the blade reduces weight and doubles as a nail nick for opening
  • Deep-carry pocket clip is designed for right handed tip-up carry
  • Integrated carabiner clip
name: Kershaw Reverb XL Knife - Unisex
